extendedInfo.description: ** For best results, be sure to align the corners of the magazine pages with the corners of the Eye Capture camera viewer using the yellow arrows as a guide *** What we do* Eye Capture is the ground-breaking mobile solution for magazine readers and the publishing industry. Eye Capture ties together the printed page and the internet using innovation and technology, and acts like QR codes on steroids, only without the QR codes, hidden codes, or any codes. We keep the focus uniquely on the reader and print magazine.We work directly with magazines to Eye Capturize their pages. Check our website at ** www.eyecapture.net ** for participating magazines, and for samples to use to try out our app.With Eye Capture, you take a picture of the entire page and are presented with an screen full of images and magazine-approved links of content thatâs directly related to whatâs on that page. Now you can visit product websites, watch a video or two or three, Like them on Facebook, follow them on twitter, and yes, even buy the product, all from the capture of just the single page. All without having to search for it on a browser, or dig through confusing websites on your iPhone or iPod. Those little square codes can only show you just one of these options. And unlike other programs, the content is magazine-approved, so you know itâll be great. When you discover something new, you can share it with your friends on Facebook, twitter, through text messages, and email!We work directly with magazines and weâre new, so please be patient with us as we grow. Visit our website for samples to try out our app (print out samples or capture the screen). And if you have a magazine that youâd like to have Eye Capturized, please let us know!You can experience Eye Capture even if you don't have a magazine that is activated.http://www.eyecapture.net/try-it-here.html

reviews.title: It has potential...
reviews.comment: It can be a great app, but it still needs a lot of work.  It does capture some pages correctly, but most of the time, it captures the incorrect page.  The concept is nice, but it is frustrating that it doesn\'t work correctly most of the time.
reviews.author: Nikki Carrol

reviews.title: Not good
reviews.comment: Will not capture the issue. Tried numerous times and keep getting different issues but the one in front of me! Needs a lot of work. Maybe I\'ll try again someday.
reviews.author: suzan roche

reviews.title: Terrible
reviews.comment: Nice concept... But a miserable failure. Half the time it doesn\'t even capture a photo, let alone the correct one or issue. No idea how this was ever approved for release.
reviews.author: Tae Alvernaz

reviews.title: This app is crap!
reviews.comment: It doesn\'t capture the correct page and I\'m unable to delete the wrong ones.  Of the 5 pages I tried, I got 4 different issues and 12 different pages.  It\'s a good idea, but needs A LOT of help to get to the basic idea of the app.  Please don\'t add new ideas until the basic ones are fixed.
reviews.author: Lisa Stovall

reviews.title: Good idea,  bad app
reviews.comment: I love the idea, but it rarely works. If it does actually capture an image, its usually not the correct one. It kept registering the wrong cover the few times I got it to work at all.
reviews.author: Brooke Langdon

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: This app has a lot of potential but needs a lot of work. There\'s no way to permanently delete bad screenshots and the links provided could be better.
reviews.author: Jess Sproul

reviews.title: Needs work
reviews.comment: This is a great idea, but not a good app. This pulls up wrong pages and is not easy to pull up your pages to read what you wanted to save. Skip for now.
reviews.author: Sarah Gatewood

reviews.title: Very poor
reviews.comment: I\'m all for giving new apps a chance, but this one is.the worst. It constantly force closes. It\'s a shame, I was excited about it. Developer, you shouldn\'t have put this one out until you tested it first.
reviews.author: Donna Skaggs

reviews.title: Never worked
reviews.comment: Tried to use app. four times with no success. Uninstalled thirty minutes after installing.
reviews.author: Kristal Caldwell

reviews.title: Eye Capture
reviews.comment: It\'s a good app took pictures but the picture didn\'t go with some of the information also some of the words was too small for my HTC  to make larger.
reviews.author: Amy Bennett

reviews.title: Works well for me! Great first effort!
reviews.comment: This app is unique and one of a kind. The developers even ask for patience as it is a new technology. Of the first four pages I captured, only one was a miss, and I was in a not well lit room. So, not bad at all. There are instructions for those having difficulties. Can\'t wait to see more from this app in the future as more publications jump on board :)
reviews.author: Bewitching Sensations

reviews.title: Useless
reviews.comment: Can\'t do anything with this app. It forecloses before I can snap the page.
reviews.author: Jennifer Murphy

reviews.title: Awful!!!!!
reviews.comment: I snap a picture of a page and it keeps giving me a Loreal ad..The concept is great, but the app is aweful.
reviews.author: Phyllis Martin

reviews.title: Not working for me either.
reviews.comment: I am having the same problem as the others.  Does a force close every time i try to take a picture of the magazine cover.
reviews.author: Jennifer Guymon

reviews.title: Not working properly.
reviews.comment: Just downloaded. After snapping pic with app, it says app has stopped working.
reviews.author: Jill Donovan

reviews.title: Not a good first impression...
reviews.comment: I download this app a few minutes ago and so for it\'s not working. The first step is to snap a picture of the magazine cover you\'re reading. I tried 3 times & the app stopped working each time.
reviews.author: Carla Lindenman

reviews.title: Needs improvement
reviews.comment: I downloaded the app and was excited to use it.  It captured the page,  but the items I was interested in were not included.  I tried another page and the picture captured was not the one in the magazine.  Keep working on it and improve it and I may try again.  I uninstalled right away.  Waste of time.
reviews.author: Debra Sparks

reviews.comment: I really give this no stars. crashed 2 times right away on my Samsung galaxy s3\tNot a good app. It needs a lot of work.
reviews.author: Cindy Cutler

reviews.title: Disappointed
reviews.comment: I was excited to downld this, but its not workn for me, captures the cover multiple times, and then when I try to snap a page it wont show up on screen. And has multiple screen shots of 1 mag. Cover I took, tried to delete them but they come right back. Please fix...
reviews.author: norma logue

reviews.title: No bueno
reviews.comment: Doesn\'t work.
reviews.author: Tenisha Alston
